channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP Disclosure Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP Disclosure Management

item.title: CVE-2018-2412|2024-08-05T04:21:32.877Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20disclosure%20management
item.description: SAP Disclosure Management 10.1 does not perform necessary authorization checks for an authenticated user, resulting in escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2018-2403|2024-08-05T04:21:33.236Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20disclosure%20management
item.description: Under certain conditions, SAP Disclosure Management 10.1 allows an attacker to access information which would otherwise be restricted. It is possible for an authorized user to get SAP Disclosure Management to point a specific chapter type to a chapter the user has not been given access to.

item.title: CVE-2018-2404|2024-08-05T04:21:32.849Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20disclosure%20management
item.description: SAP Disclosure Management 10.1 allows an attacker to upload any file without proper file format validation.

item.title: CVE-2018-2413|2024-08-05T04:21:33.914Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20disclosure%20management
item.description: SAP Disclosure Management 10.1 does not perform necessary authorization checks for an authenticated user, resulting in escalation of privileges.
